courses.title: Piano Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basic principles of playing the piano, including note reading, hand positioning, and basic chords.

courses.title: Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Master the art of playing the guitar, from strumming techniques to advanced soloing.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the fundamental principles of music theory, including scales, intervals, and harmony.

courses.title: Singing Techniques
courses.description: Improve your singing voice with proper breathing techniques, vocal exercises, and performance tips.

courses.title: Drum Basics
courses.description: Learn the basics of drumming, including rhythm patterns, drum fills, and basic beats.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the basics of playing the bass guitar, including finger techniques, scales, and grooves.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Learn the art of songwriting, including lyric writing, melody creation, and song structure.

courses.title: Music Production Basics
courses.description: Understand the basics of music production, including recording techniques, mixing, and mastering.

courses.title: Violin Techniques
courses.description: Improve your violin playing with proper bowing techniques, finger positioning, and intonation.

courses.title: Flute Mastery
courses.description: Master the art of playing the flute, from proper embouchure to advanced techniques.
